name: Apis: the beehive API game
description:
You are the hivemind. You control a beehive. Direct egg laying, pollen gathering, and so on for bees.

There are no graphics at all. The only user interface is a REST API running locally. In order to play, you will need programming experience. You can use any programming language of your choosing, as long as it can do REST API.

THIS GAME IS EARLY ALPHA. You can bee part of it's development by trying it and commenting.
